name: portifoliopessoal
description: Projeto para divulgar curr√≠culo e projetos de forma segura, sem login, com backend em Docker.
author: Siewert, Guilherme

scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.e2e:servers: cross-env PORTFOLIO_DATA=test E2E_MODE=1 PORT=3001 ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://127.0.0.1:5173,http://localhost:5173 concurrently -k -s first "node backend/src/server.js" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.prod:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.prod:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
